title: Sponsored Diamond Team looking for a new top
body:
Looking to replace our current top with someone better.

Current roster:

Current Top: GGP No Internet

Previous tops: Ramzlol (Diamond 1), xxswinswinxx (Diamond 4), Eftychios (Diamond 5), Bawol (Diamond 5), Bird Jaguar (Diamond 5), nisaji (Diamond 4), 


Mid: Locke Lamora (Diamond 1)

Previous Mids: Laserhard (Diamond 5), Smite Infinity (Diamond 3), GGP No Internet

Sub mids: Kyyrick (Plat 3) Eftychios (Diamond 5), Best Yazeduo NA(diamond 1-2), SHG Icicle (Diamond 3), Doom Annie Bot (Diamond 3)


Jungle: GGP Rotato (Plat 5-1 seasoned tourney veteran)

Previous Junglers: Janoksaboss (Diamond 4 notable lee sin), Quest and k0 (Diamond 3)

Sub Junglers:  The Evelynn (Diamond 4)


ADC: GGP Stingus (Diamond 1)



Support: Nyanami 

Previous supports: ActuallyAshley(Diamond 5), MangoStrudel (Diamond 4), LegitGangstaG (Diamond 5, peak D1)

Sub Supports:  The Support Bot (Diamond 2), Im Your Support (Diamond 2), 


Captain: GGP Rotato

Shotcallers: GGP Rotato, GGP Stingus

Analyst: PkBlitzkrieg (high level game experience)


About our sponsor: We are sponsored by 1shotGG, a gaming organisation with several perks involved, message me for details.

About us as a team: My team as a whole have gone through several high elo tournaments, semi pro bracketed tournaments and participated in several mobafire tournaments. We regularly face high diamond 1 teams and half the time we face high rated challenger teams in tournaments. We are committed fully, me especially as captain and manager of our team. I have put countless hours into making this team work and succeed for us and will not let it just fade away.

Expectations: I expect if you add me you will NOT RAGE, you will be able to play at the high diamond level of competition we regularly compete at in weekly tournaments (if you cannot, do not bother adding me or replying to this forum), you will not take elo as a factor in my decision making or team managing skills (in other words, elo elitists need not apply), and you are willing to take criticism and realize that although we may not be perfect as a team or as individual players we're looking to improve together as a team for the long haul.

Also let it be known that if you can provide me with a video of one of your games your chances of making the team will be GREATLY INCREASED as it saves me the trouble of trying you out, I do not use lolreplay so you will have to either upload them to youtube or find some other way to get them to me.


If you are interested in joining our team please add GGP Rotato in game or reply here using this format.

Summoner name:
Role:
Age:
Rank:
Team experience:
Champion Pool:
Time Zone:
Anything I should know:

replies.body:
I just played you in ranked 5s o.o

I don't play top, so obviously I'm not interested, but would you still care to tell me what the perks are?

Summoner Name - DaCush
Role - I dominate all lanes
Age - 25
Rank - Bronze 4
Champion Pool - Teemo
Time Zone - Mountain
Anything you should know: Would be willing to tryout for the shot caller/co-captain. I'm a done it all know it all kinda guy

Summoner name:
Role: All, pref not support.
Age: 18 
Rank: Currently Plat 3, have been diamond 1 50+ points multiple times.
Team experience: Not much on high level teams besides s2, had triple diamond in s2 on my previous acc. Was always a shotcaller/lead though
Champion Pool: All but Yorick are playable, (Not currently owned on this acc)
Time Zone: EST
Anything I should know: Been playing since S1, and was the main guy behind revealing how strong AP Eve was in S2 in the thread that got red acknowledged and 200k+ views and 60+ pages of replys

Summoner name: Sock God
Role: Top
Age: 18
Rank: Diamond 3 Currently
Team experience: Some
Champion Pool: Damage Oriented Tops  {{champion:84}} 
Time Zone: Pacific
Anything I should know: I play a Win/lose style which I am trying to improve

Summoner name: deegodoubledees
Role: top
Age: 19
Rank: diamond 5
Team experience: ive bneen playing since open beta
Champion Pool: mao, irelia, nasus, ryze, lulu
Time Zone: PST
Anything I should know: N/A

Summoner name: selfz
Role: toperino
Age: 19
Rank: d4
Team experience: too much
Champion Pool: irelia,riven,rumble,jax,jayce
Time Zone: est
Anything I should know: participated in some go4lol tournies, won tournies got triumphant ryze,derp

Role: Top
Age: 26
Rank: Plat 2
Team experience: Been on several teams, shotcalled and picked teamcomps on most
Champion Pool: Aatrox, Diana, Mundo, Irelia, Jax, Malphite, Nasus, Poppy, Sion, Skarner, Trist, Trundle, Warwick, Wukong (I can pick up champs pretty quickly as long as their mechanics allow me to play them effectively)
Time Zone: 8-12 EST
Anything I should know: weaker on the mechanics, but strong laner, also have lots of game knowledge/understanding, like to play a high pressure playstyle (somewhat like Darien used to), but can adapt depending on the champ/team needs

Summoner name: Raykin
Role: Top
Age: 21
Rank: D3
Team experience: Tons
Champion Pool: Most
Time Zone: PST
Anything I should know: I play a lot of non meta stuff and I would like to stick with a lot of them. we can discuss that later tho

not an elo elitist...
However, my current top lane isn't good.
Looking for a better one.


loled irl.
